amendment.description: To require a report to Congress on the health of the Afghan special immigrant visa program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2124 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2124 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Cotton to Amendment SA 2123. (consideration: CR S5155; text: CR S5155) To require a report to Congress on the health of the Afghan special immigrant visa program.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2124 proposed by Senator Shelby for Senator Cotton to Amendment SA 2123.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2124 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
